column5: Looks like with all the warm weather and rain there is starting to be some open water up in the Kawartha's specifically from my lake Lower Buckhorn which as you can see from this webcam from the Reach Harbour Resort shows some open water in front of their property bring on the soft water season!! Here's the link to the webcam if you are interested http://www.reachharbour.com/weather.html Enjoy!! Kawartha Kev Here is the link to the resort if you want to check the progress just click where you see webcam http://www.reachharbour.com/
Rivers been open over a week now. Ive seen open areas on Chemong as well.
I'm on Upper Buckhorn and lots of open water in the southern channel. Areas around Chemong are opening up too.
